segments.pli: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṃ nikkhittā evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: “Mendicants, a nun with five qualities is cast down to hell.

segments.pli: Āvāsamaccharinī hoti, kulamaccharinī hoti, lābhamaccharinī hoti, vaṇṇamaccharinī hoti, dhammamaccharinī hoti.
segments.en: She is stingy with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and the teaching.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṃ nikkhittā evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: A nun with these five qualities is cast down to hell.

segments.pli: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṃ nikkhittā evaṃ sagge.
segments.en: A nun with five qualities is raised up to heaven.

segments.pli: Na āvāsamaccharinī hoti, na kulamaccharinī hoti, na lābhamaccharinī hoti, na vaṇṇamaccharinī hoti, na dhammamaccharinī hoti.
segments.en: She is not stingy with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, or the teaching.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṃ nikkhittā evaṃ sagge”ti.
segments.en: A nun with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
